text: abasese yakhana rasulagana (tadera sampradayera imana theke) nirasa halena ebam lokera mane karala ye, rasulaganake mithya asbasa deya hayeche takhana tadera kache amadera sahayya asala. Ebhabe amara yake icche kari se najata paya. Ara aparadhi sampapradaya hate amadera sasti pratirodha kara haya na
